title: Smart Data models - cemeteryDepartment schema
description: Data regarding the different departments (blocks, streets, areas, etc) in which cemeteries and graveyards may be divided.

name.description: Property. Name, number, letter, etc. by which the department may be identified. Units: 'n/a'

refCemetery.description: Relationship. Reference to the entity representing the particular cemetery to which the department belongs. Must be an entity with type: Building and category: Cemetery.
